::Hot Rod::

"Vehical mode!"
He transforms to car mode, allowing all the shots to pass over him.
He puts the petal to the metal, and takes off, towards Sharpedge. He
hopes to ram him.

::DrillBit::

He looks at Darkfate's troops.
"I am DrillBit."
He motions towards Killfest.
"And this is Killfest. We are both in command here."

OOC:JP, StarScream shot nukes at Megatron.
